summary: Marcus Vindicus is an Imperial Tank Follower - Restoration, Heavy Armor and Two Handed.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b]First Mod ever, so if there are any bugs or suggestions, tell me :)[/b]
Marcus Vindicus is based off of my first Skyrim character, who was the exact same as it is now!
His default armor is Imperial Heavy Armor without helmet. His weapon that comes with him is the Executioners Axe.
You can find him at the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. He will be walking around, it's impossible to miss him.
[b][u]No Mods are required, but some are recommended.[/u][/b]
[/size][i][u][size=3]Note: He will NOT affect your sneak meter, so he is stealth user friendly.[/size]
[/u][/i]
[size=5]Main Stats:[/size]
[b]Heavy Armor- 80
Restoration- 80
Two-Handed- 90
[/b][size=4][i]Rest of Stats are good too, but not OP.
[/i][/size]
[b]Recommended Mods:
[/b][size=4]Perfect Legionnaire- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6085/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6085/?
[/url]SkySights Skins- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?[/url][/size]

[size=3][b]I hope you love him! Thanks, Ashton. [/b][/size]
author: Secrets of Skyrim
